TopicTitle: Can someone post me a clean TRAITS.cfg file?

Articles.Content: I edited my traits.cfg a little too much and didn't save an original copy, I cant find it anywhere, can someone upload one for me? its located in: \GameData\Squad\Experience

As that's a Squad asset, it's not strictly legal for anyone to share the file... if you have KSP on Steam, you could simply delete it and have Steam verify the game cache and download the file again. If you got KSP from the Store, the Patcher should be able to do a similar thing if you run it after deleting the file.
